Name: 中国象棋-残局大师
About the game: '中国象棋-残局' is a single leisure chess game. This game mainly focuses on the classic remnant game of Chinese chess, currently provides 60 levels, followed by nearly 460 levels. In the final game, the principle is 'red first, red must win'. If you go the right way. The red side will surely win. If you miss a step, you will lose everything.
